Bosses.Name: Ifrit (Phase 1)
Bosses.Strategy: Non-tank players should not stand in front of Ifrit due to his cleave attacks.

Mechanics.Name: Crimson Cyclone
Mechanics.Description: Stands in the corner of the boss room before dashing forward

Bosses.Name: Ifrit (Phase 2)
Bosses.Strategy: During phase 2, Ifrit will gain two new abilities: Sear and Radiant Plume. Plumes in this phase are outer plumes then inner plumes. Followed by Eruption then Cyclone.

Mechanics.Name: Radiant Plume
Mechanics.Description: Places glowing red circles on ground, exploding within a few seconds.

Bosses.Name: Ifrit (Phase 3)
Bosses.Strategy: At 50%% HP, ifrit will summon 4 nails. If any nails remain when Ifrit casts Hellfire, it will kill all players.

Mechanics.Name: Hellfire
Mechanics.Description: Massive raid-wide attack, killing players if any Nails remain.

Bosses.Name: Ifrit (Phase 4)
Bosses.Strategy:
After Hellfire has been cast, Ifrit enters phase 4 where they have all the abilities from phase 2 excluding Hellfire.

The order of attacks in this phase:
- Outer Radiant Plumes
- Inner Radiant Plumes
- Eruption
- Zone-wide Radiant plumes
- Dashes (Left always dashes first)
